1370: Heideric moved to Scherbier straet.B.0 after marriage.
Got married to Gheesen at age 34 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Marisseis, at age 35.
1372: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Reymodis, at age 36.
1373: Had a son with Gheesen, Gheuardus, at age 37.
Lost son Gheuardus when Gheuardus was 1 years old.
1374: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Heylewigis, at age 38.
1375: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Esa, at age 39.
1380: Had a daughter with Gheesen, Gertrudis, at age 44.
